data.prayer: Father, we ask for 286 new simple churches in the county of Yvelines, Île-de-France, France. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,433,400 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yvelines, Île-de-France, France
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the the county of Yvelines will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Yvelines. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Yvelines, Île-de-France, France.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Berber, Shawiya people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 17,613 believers in Yvelines, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 17,613 believers in Yvelines to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary:
the county of Yvelines, Île-de-France, France has a population of 1,433,400.

We estimate Yvelines has 17,613 people who might know Jesus, 876,553 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 539,235 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Yvelines, Île-de-France, France so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
